name: ArrowInvasion
description:
Arrow Invasion is a 2d Puzzle Platformer made for Vim Jam 3. 
The army of arrows has invaded your castle to try to steal your great diamond! The source of your power! Stop them! Before it's too late!

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Move/Jump
Spacebar - Fireball
P - Pause
R - Restart 

(If the browser version lags, there is a downloadable for windows that doesn't lag)
